home.title: Welcome to Kids Learning
home.subtitle: Discover a world of fun and educational activities designed to help children learn and grow through play.

coloring.title: Creative Coloring
coloring.description: Express creativity through our interactive coloring activities. Choose from hundreds of fun designs and learn about colors and shapes.

puzzles.title: Brain Teasers
puzzles.description: Challenge young minds with engaging puzzles that develop problem-solving skills and critical thinking.

memory.title: Memory Games
memory.description: Enhance memory and concentration with our collection of fun memory games designed for different age groups.

cta.title: Join Our Learning Community
cta.description: Create a profile to track progress, save favorite activities, and unlock special features.

activities.title: Learning Activities
activities.subtitle: Explore our collection of fun and educational activities designed to help children learn and grow.

games.title: Educational Games
games.subtitle: Play and learn with our collection of fun educational games designed for different age groups.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Making learning fun and engaging for children through interactive activities and games.
